\item[(H5)] $(\mathrm{RKHS})$ or $(\mathrm{MD/IND/AB})$ --- prime contraction via the RKHS route (Theorem~\ref{thm:rkhs-tstar}) or the archival MD/IND/AB chain (Theorem~\ref{md:thm:INDprime}).
\item[(H6)] $(\mathrm{T5})$ --- compact-by-compact transfer of positivity (Theorem~\ref{thm:T5-compact}).

\end{description}  Sections~\ref{sec:T0}--\ref{sec:T5} establish (H1)--(H6); the closure Theorem~\ref{thm:Main-positivity} assumes precisely these hypotheses, and Theorem~\ref{thm:RH} invokes (H1)--(H
